title: DayZ Origins 1.7.1 Client Files
description:
===============================
DayZOrigins1.7.1 - Client files
===============================


Summary:

    @DayzOrigins    - Download and place folder (and all sub-contents) in your Arma2 directory.

    RUN_ORIGINS.cmd - this runs DayZ Origins (an alternative to other game launchers)


Detailed Instructions:

  1. Place '@DayzOrigins' (and all sub-contents) in your Arma2 directory
  2. Run batch script "RUN_ORIGINS.cmd"
  3. DayZ Origins loads
  4. Menu: Click Multiplayer
  	*Pop-Up: Multiplayer message*
  5. Click OK
  6. Search for DayZ Origins 1.7.1 games
